alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Northern Monterey Bay (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 1:43PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Showers producing small hail will impact portions of southeastern Santa Cruz, south central Santa Clara, northwestern San Benito and northwestern Monterey Counties through 215 PM PDT... At 141 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers producing small hail near Interlaken, or near Watsonville, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Watsonville, Gilroy, Corralitos, Aptos, Brown Valley Road, Freedom, Eureka Canyon Road, Uvas Canyon Park, Rio Del Mar, Amesti, Prunedale, Interlaken, Aromas, Aptos Hills-Larkin Valley, Pajaro, Elkhorn, Aptos Hills-Larkin, Day Valley, Las Lomas and San Martin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Northern Monterey Bay
